card.text: Play this card and immediately play a new Location in the same Region right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Acid Rain
card.text: No Location bears the Forest attribute. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Alex Cordry
card.text: Alex Cordry can Join with any one Steadfast Ally.

card.name: Alien Abduction
card.text: Choose one Ally of up to 4 points in value (including Weapons) that your opponent must Bury . If you have Greys in play as an Ally, Bury a chosen Ally of any value. Then Bury this card.

card.name: An Unexpected Calamity
card.text: This card may only be played after one Pass has already been announced for the Round. Play this card, announce "Pass," then Bury this card. Skip this Round's Combat and go directly to End Of Round.

card.name: Anti-Gravity Harness
card.text: Costs 2 Sanity points to use. Travel to any Location in the same Dimension, as if Walking. May Travel between Regions and to Space Locations, but not to other Exotic Locations.

card.name: Area 51
card.text: You may play UFO if this is your Current Location, even if you don't have Greys in play as an Ally.

card.name: Artist Colony
card.text: All Artists and Authors add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: Ashes, Ashes, Azathoth
card.text: MONSTERS (two) have overrun the city. Through the sight of your WEAPON you see a BUSINESS and a MUSEUM lying in RUINS, and an Army TANK lies broken and useless. You're on your own. You grab the cold metal of your TACTICAL NUCLEAR BOMB, and take careful aim at the CORRUPT CULTIST summoning his evil lord (a GREAT OLD ONE or OUTER GOD). You know that you are too close to survive yourself, but only you can end this madness.

card.name: Azathoth
card.text: Each Investigator suffers 2 points of Radiation damage the moment that this card is played. ◆ Ignore red Sanity pentagrams and reverse the effect of green Sanity pentagrams for all cards played while Azathoth is in play. ◆ Investigators may not gain Sanity.

card.name: Azathoth And Others
card.text: An Unexpected Calamity can not be played by any player.

card.name: B-Movie Script
card.text: Bury this card and cause one opponent to "recast" (Flip) his or her Investigator card unless that opponent loses 2 Sanity points by rejecting the script.

card.name: Bank Vault
card.text: On a Turn following the play of this card, place 1-3 Tomes or Artifacts from your Hand face-down beneath the Bank Vault (max 3). Cards are not in play. Bury this card to return cards to your Hand. Cards are Discarded if this card is lost.

card.name: Bibliophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point at the beginning of each Turn that your Current Location features the Tome attribute.

card.name: Billington's Woods
card.text: This card also fulfills the Nemesis requirements for playing Yog-Sothoth.

card.name: Black Belt
card.text: Add 1 point to Ally's value. During Combat Ally is Buried only if he or she takes full card value in Sanity loss. If Ally is lost this card suffers the same fate.

card.name: Blackout
card.text: It is now night. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. ◆ Each opponent loses 1 Sanity point if their Current Location features the City attribute when this card is played.

card.name: Bless
card.text: Target Weapon becomes Enchanted for the remainder of the Round.

card.name: Blink of an Eye
card.text: Play this card, and the pass by a player on an earlier Turn is voided — no Passes have been announced for the current Round. You may immediately play a second card. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Brother of the Yellow Sign
card.text: Can know two Yellow Sign Spells; can know any one Spell otherwise. Bury Spell after it is cast.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist & Artist. Knows French, Italian & German

card.name: Bulletproof Vest
card.text: Give this card to one of your Allies in play. As long as you have other Allies in play, exclude Ally with Vest when you must randomly choose an Ally.

card.name: Call the Unnamed One
card.text: Cast this spell to immediately play one Monster card as an Ally (no Gate needed).

card.name: Camp Bright Star
card.text: It was exciting to drive through the COUNTRY to Camp Bright Star near the lake (a different COUNTRY/WATER LOCATION). We swam most of the day. That NIGHT we clustered around the fire, listening to ole' Zeke paint a DISTURBING PORTRAIT of a crazed SCIENTIST suffering from a PHOBIA and a PHILIA, who killed a girl at a nearby SITE. After, we can sneak into the old CEMETERY and find her grave. Hey, maybe we'll even see a MONSTER!

card.name: Chainsaw
card.text: Add 2 points to Ally's value. You may add Ally to a Threat in the Commit Allies phase of Combat.

card.name: Chakota Beast
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this Monster if you or your opponent's Current Location is Underground. Joins Chakota Beast.

card.name: Chaosium
card.text: Your Author Allies add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: Chronoportation
card.text: Immediately play any Tome or Artifact from another Dimension that would otherwise be legal at your Current Location.

card.name: Cité Tatoue
card.text: Spend 1 Sanity point to tattoo (play) a Spell on any Steadfast Ally. Bury Spell when cast.

card.name: Cloning Chamber
card.text: Give this card to an Ally in play (except Living Dead). You may have more than one copy of that Ally card in play. If this card is lost, clones remain in play.

card.name: Colour Out Of Space
card.text: Subtract 3 points from the value of this card if your opponet has protection from Radiation.

card.name: Create Stasis
card.text: May only be played during Combat. Set aside one random card in the target Directed Threat; it does not particpate in Combat this round. Target begins the next Round with that card in his or her Threat.

card.name: Crop Circles
card.text: You may only play this card if your Current Location features the Outside attribute. Immediately play one Monster to your Threat. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Cthulhu For President
card.text: Bury all Star Events in play. ◆ If a card is played that would Bury a GOO Bury this card instead. ◆ You may Bury this card instead of rotating or Burying a GOO at the end of the Round.

attr.value: Affects Great Old Ones & Outer Gods

card.name: Cthulhu Statuette
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity point to use. May only be used during Combat. Change the nature of one Ally in Combat. If not Defending may now become a Defending Ally. If already Defending may become non-Defending, or may Defend against a different Directed Threat.

card.name: Cykranosh
card.text: May play this card in any Dimension; assumes Dimension indicator of previous Current Location. ◆ Beginning each Turn you must be able to survive in Space or lose 5 Sanity points. ◆ Increase the value of your Formless Spawn by one point. ◆ This card also fulfills the Blackout requirement for playing Tsathoggua.

card.name: Dark Horse
card.text: This election, you'll help your candidate any way you can. You slip an IRS AUDITOR incriminating evidence on your opponent and fan MEDIA HYPERBOLE to paint a DISTURBING PORTRAIT of him. You summon a HOUND OF TINDALOS to eliminate his campaign team and your agents, the MEN IN BLACK, fill their places. Onboard the 747, you accompany your candidate to campaign stops in THREE different SUBREGIONS. In the end, you'll vote CTHULHU FOR PRESIDENT. Why settle for the lesser evil?

card.name: Darkness of the Void
card.text: It is now Night. Place this card in Event area. Bury any Day, Night, Storm, or Drought Events in play. Day Events may not be played. Bury this card if any Night Event is played.

card.name: Day the Sun Stood Still
card.text: The world can change in the BLINK OF AN EYE, especially with help from someone like you. A premonition alerted you to an UNEXPECTED ECLIPSE, visible only from THREE different COUNTRY LOCATIONS. You have long awaited this moment! Searching through the ZANTHU TABLETS your learn how to CALL THE UNNAMED ONE to loose Ye Liveliest Awfullness (a MONSTER) upon the rest of the world.

card.name: Daybreak
card.text: It is now Day. Bury any Day or Night Event in Play. ◆ Flip one chosen Ally of one Opponent.

card.name: DBZ Spacelab
card.text: Your Investigator automatically survives in Space at this Location. ◆ You may play this card immediately after playing Shuttle Icarus. You may walk to Tycho Base.

card.name: Deep-One Hybrid
card.text: You may use a Water Gate to play Deep Ones as Allies. This Investigator Breathes Underwater.

card.name: Deliverance
card.text: On vacation at long last, you head upriver through the rugged countryside of TWO CATSKILLS LOCATIONS with your friend, a DREAMER. Then, things go horribly wrong. Your craft capsizes and you are captured by a SERIAL KILLER, who makes you do unspeakable things, giving you a PHOBIA. He takes you to his hideaway SITE where you are enthralled by the banjo playing of his younger cousin, a MUSICIAN. Finally you grab his WEAPON and make good your escape.

card.name: Delta Green, Alpha Squad
card.text: Joins with Weapons at Artifact Locations.

card.name: Diabolical Cultist
card.text: You may use a Tome Gate to play Servants of the Silver Twilight as Allies. This Investigator is a Member of the Silver Twilight: gain an additional point of Sanity each time you complete a Corrupt Adventure.

card.name: Different Worlds
card.text: In college you discovered dark secrets about the world. You must tell the rest of humanity! Refurbishing a RUINS, you found your own publishing company (CHAOSIUM), along with TWO ALLIES who are either AUTHORS, INVENTORS, or ARTISTS. Working on your LAPTOP COMPUTER, you publish at least one TOME per month, now on sale both on the INTERNET and at a BUSINESS LOCATION.

card.name: Dimensional Shambler
card.text: Bypasses your opponent's Directed Threat. Add 1 point to the Value of this card if the Current Location of your opponent is Exotic or is in any Dimension other than the Waking World. ◆ Joins Dimensional Shambler.

card.name: Disturbing Portrait
card.text: This card has constant effect. While in the New Aeon, you may find Waking World Allies from your current subregion.

card.name: Dr. Carl Jung
card.text: Can be played at either Waking World or New Æon Locations. ◆ You may Bury a Phobia in the same Turn that a Sanitarium becomes your Current Location.

card.name: Dr. Carlos MacDonald
card.text: This Doctor and one Ally of your choice are excluded when determining the results of an Epidemic.

card.name: Dr. MacDonald's House
card.text: Randomly Discard one card from your hand. ◆ During each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Ebola Virus
card.text: Discard a random Ally of chosen opponent. Each other player's Investigator also in the same subregion must also randomly Discard one Ally. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Emergency Medical Equipment
card.text: Bury this card to cancel the effects of a card played since your last Turn that would otherwise cause you to Bury or Discard an Ally or Allies.

card.name: Enthrall Victims
card.text: Flip two random Allies of Target opponent.

card.name: European Space Agency
card.text: While this is your Current Location, you may spend a Turn and Bury one Storm Event or Drought.

card.name: Evoke Doppleganger
card.text: Cast on an Ally (except Living Dead) and immediately play another copy of that Ally card whether or not he or she could be played at your Current Location.

card.name: Exorcism
card.text: May only be used during Combat. Discard a Monster from your Threat and Bury a random card from target Directed Threat.

card.name: False Dawn
card.text: It is now Night. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Living Dead Monsters do not Join while this card is in play.

card.name: Fish-Head Rock
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Deep One and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts. You may use this Gate to play New Æon Monsters

card.name: Flesh Ward
card.text: Once cast and as long as this card remains face-down, your Investigator is protected from the effects of Radiation. At the end of the Round you may spend 1 Sanity point to keep this card face-down.

card.name: Fractal Creatures
card.text: Reduce the value of this creature by 2 points if Summoned. ◆ Joins Fractal Creatures.

card.name: Fragmentation Grenade
card.text: Add 1 point to Ally's value. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, this Weapon suffers the same fate. ◆ During Combat Bury this card to Bury one non-Defending Ally.

card.name: Frivolous Lawsuit
card.text: Force an opponent to Discard one in-play card of your choice, except their Current Location or an Adventure, that fulfilled the requirements of an Adventure that was Just Played. Then Bury this card.

attr.value: Steadfast Reporter. Knows French, Chinese & English

card.name: Gilman House Hotel
card.text: An Unexpected Calamity can not be played by any player.

card.name: Giovanni Angellis
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if there are Corrupt Allies among those opposing him in Combat.

attr.value: Steadfast Police Detective. Knows Italian & English.

card.name: Giulio Cesare Hotel
card.text: An Unexpected Calamity can not be played by any player.

card.name: Going Postal
card.text: Bury a random Ally; Discard that Ally if opponent's Current Location is a Business. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Government Quarantine
card.text: Opponent skips the Discard phase at the end of the Round, and must keep all cards remaining in his or her Hand, even above Maximum. Bury this card at the end of the Round.

card.name: Grasp Of Cthulhu
card.text: All Monsters Join, for all Investigators, for the remainder of the Round.

card.name: Greenwich Village
card.text: Your Artists, Authors, and Students add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: Greys
card.text: Use an Outside Gate to play as an Ally. ◆ Joins Greys.

card.name: Grinning Ghoul
card.text: You may use a Cemetery Gate to play Ghouls as Allies. Reduce Directed Threat attacking this Investigator by one point when Threats are revealed if that opponent's Current Location is Underground or Cemetery.

card.name: Halitosiphobia
card.text: If target opponent has one or more Allies in play, her or she loses 1 Sanity point at the beginning of each Turn that his or her Current Location features the Inside attribute.

card.name: Harbor Place Hotel
card.text: An Unexpected Calamity can not be played by any player.

card.name: Haz-Mat Team
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card when your Current Location has the government attribute.

card.name: Helicopter
card.text: On a following Turn play a new Location in the same Region right-side-up on top of your Story Deck. ◆ You may flip face-up one card in one opponent's Threat as your Turn while this card is your Current Location.

card.name: High Priest of Elvis
card.text: Play only at an Exotic Location. Bury this card to choose one Great Old One or Outer God from your Story Deck and immediately play it.

card.name: Hitch A Ride
card.text: On a following Turn, play a new Location in the same Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck. ◆ Hang for a Turn to play an Ally card that could be played in this Region (one Ally per Hitch a Ride).

card.name: Hitman from Medellin
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. When revealed, each Hitman From Medellin eliminates (Buries) one random Ally, Defending or not. Joins Hitman From Medellin.

card.name: Hound of Tindalos
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your opponent is inside.

card.name: Howard Lovecraft
card.text: Bury any Howard Lovecraft currently in play, for all Investigators.

attr.value: Steadfast Author & Scientist. Knows English, Binary & Hyperborean

card.name: Hydrophilia
card.text: An opponent may not play a Phobia on you while their current Location features the Water attribute. Bury this card when you play a Sanitarium or Temple.

card.name: Ill Omen
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. Monsters in an opposing Directed Threat are Discarded at the end of Combat instead of being Buried.

card.name: Insidious Ululation of the Invisible Supplicants
card.text: Once cast and as long as this card remains face-down, your Investigator is protected from the effects of Space. At the end of the Round you may spend 1 Sanity point to keep this card face-down.

card.name: Internet, The
card.text: If you also have Laptop Computer in play, add 1 point to this card's value (randomly lose spell if Laptop is lost). ◆ Joins with Laptop Computer at Artifact/Tome Locations, even if you do not currently know Binary.

card.name: INTERPOL, Italian Headquarters
card.text: May play any Police Detective or Corrupt Ally from the New Æon at this Location. ◆ Your Police Detective and Private Eye allies add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: IRS Auditor
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. When revealed, each IRS Auditor confiscates one chosen Artifact. Your opponent must Bury the card in his or her Story Deck.

card.name: Its Full Of Stars!
card.text: You may only play this card while your Current Location features the Space attribute. If your current Sanity is 1-7 gain 5 points; if 8-13 gain 3; if 14+ gain 1. Then Bury this card.

card.name: J. Edgar Hoover Building
card.text: Use this Gate and lose 1 Sanity point to play any one Corrupt Cultist from any Dimension. ◆ Your Police Detective and Private Eye Allies add 1 point to their card value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Joe Schienfeld
card.text: As your Turn, you may Discard two cards from your Hand and draw a new card from the top of your Mythos Deck.

attr.value: Steadfast Musician. Knows English, French & German

card.name: Kennedy Space Center
card.text: While this is your Current Location, you may spend a Turn and bury one Storm Event or Drought.

card.name: Laptop Computer
card.text: Knows Binary. ◆ Can know any one Spell. Bury Spell in your Story Deck after it is cast. ◆ Joins with The Internet at Artifact/Tome Locations.

card.name: Larva of the Other Gods, First Stage
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Space Location. ◆ When Summoned, can use to Travel In Space. Immediately play a new Location in any Region right-side-up on top of your Story Deck. ◆ Joins Larvae of the Other Gods, First Stage.

card.name: Larva Of The Other Gods, Second Stage
card.text: When Summoned can be used to Travel By Land. Immediately play a new Location in the same Region right-side-up.

card.name: Lascaux Caves
card.text: Your Explorer and Adventurer Allies add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: Look to the Future
card.text: Deep within the SMUGGLER'S TUNNELS a madman (CORRUPT ALLY) shatters the bonds of Time with new discovery--a crude TIME MACHINE. A wondrous future awaits exploitation! After MUGGING a guard, he breaks into TWO GOVERNMENT ARTIFACT LOCATIONS where he discovers bizarre machines (TWO NEW ÆON ARTIFACTS) and a NEW ÆON ALLY who may well be his descendent.

card.name: Louvre
card.text: Your Artist Allies add 1 point to their card value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Lovecraft's Grave
card.text: During each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: M16 Assault Rifle
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's Value; Ally is now Steadfast. If Ally is Discarded or Buried this card suffers the same fate.

card.name: Maison Nationale De Santé
card.text: Gain 4 Sanity points, but reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. Apply any Sanity gain or loss indicated in the pentagram on the card, the Discard it. ◆ For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Make Them Pay!
card.text: Life stinks! Up before DAYBREAK, but your car had a flat and you had to HITCH A RIDE. Your deliveries to the THREE different CITIES were late because of traffic. On your last delivery, a BLACKOUT hit and you got lost looking for the BUSINESS. Now they've fired you! They better watch out! You're one of the SERVANTS OF THE SILVER TWILIGHT, and you'll get even! (an EVENT costing Sanity)

card.name: Massa Di Requiem Per Shuggay
card.text: With a Musician Ally, you may play this Tome regardless of the languages know by your Investigator or Allies.

card.name: Mechanophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point at the beginning of each Turn that you are at an Artifact Location.

card.name: Media Hyperbole
card.text: Opponent may not use Spells or Gates in his or her Current Location. Bury this card when opponent plays a Travel Event or arrives at a new Location.

attr.value: Affects Opponent's Spell and Gate Use

card.name: Men in Black
card.text: When Threat is revealed, randomly choose one of your opponent's Allies (Defending or not) and flip that card face-down. ◆ Joins Men in Black.

card.name: Mental Suggestion
card.text: Target Investigator must reshuffle his or her Discards and Mythos Deck with no Sanity cost.

card.name: Mi-Go
card.text: Use a City Gate to play this Mi-Go as an Ally. ◆ Joins Mi-Go.

card.name: Monatomic Translocation
card.text: You may immediately play a new Location in any Dimension (except Exotic) as your Current Location.

card.name: Motion Sickness
card.text: Each opponent that Just Played a Travel Event (whether or not it is still their top Story Deck card) loses 2 Sanity points. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Mr. Shiny's Burger Palace
card.text: When this card becomes your Current Location you may immediately use its Gate to play Monster(s).

card.name: Mugging
card.text: Target Investigator loses 1 Sanity point and must remain in his or her Current Location for the next Turn but may play cards other than a new Location card or Travel Event.

card.name: Museo del Palazzo Venezia
card.text: Your Artist Allies add 1 point to their card value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Napoleon Whateley
card.text: Protection from Alien Abduction and from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment that you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may chose to Bury this card instead. Your opponent must then Bury his or her card.

card.name: Nemesis
card.text: Bury any Star Event. Any Investigator loses 1 Sanity point when he or she declares a Pass.

card.name: Night at the Opera
card.text: While on vacation at the GIULIO CESARE HOTEL, a friend (ALLY that knows Italian) invited you to the opera that NIGHT. A STORM broke at dusk, just when were to meet at the ROME LOCATION near the MUSEUM. Fortunately, you love walking in the rain (HYDOPHILIA), though a MONSTER you imagined in the shadows gave you quite a start. Finally, you made it and had a delightful time enjoying the MASSA DI REQUIEM PER SHUGGAY.

card.name: Nikola Tesla
card.text: Play in either the Waking World or New Æon. ◆ At an Artifact Gate Location you may place an Artifact from any Dimension beneath this card. If this card is lost, the Artifact suffers the same fate. The Artifact can be replaced with another, if lost.

attr.value: Steadfast Inventor & Scientist, Knows English & German

card.name: Notre Dame
card.text: For each additional Turn you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Nuclear Winter
card.text: All Investigators must Bury the top card of their Story Decks when this card is played. Bury this card if a Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Obsequious Televangelist
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Obsessed Agent in a Mi-Go Braincase
card.text: You may use a Country Gate to play Mi-Go as Allies. This Investigator automatically survives in Space.

card.name: Obsessed Federal Agent
card.text: While in the New Æon your Education rises to 18.

card.name: One Small Step
card.text: By the turn of the millennium our space agencies (KENNEDY SPACE CENTER or EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY) began exploring the cosmos (SHUTTLE ICARUS and TWO different SPACE LOCATIONS). But even the PROPHECIES OF NOSTRADAMUS could not predict what we found. There are races of MONSTERS (two Greater and two Lesser) inhabiting those nether reaches, ruled by their monstrous dark lords (a GREAT OLD ONE or OUTER GOD). Is there, then, any future for humankind?

card.name: Operation Nemesis
card.text: "Good Morning, DETECTIVE. Here at FBI Headquarters (J. EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING ) we are about to launch Operation NEMESIS. Your mission is to identify a suspected CULTIST, currently a member of a UNITED NATIONS delegation. We believe his ultimate destination to be our nation's Capitol (one WASHINGTON D.C. Location), but beware: he is known to summon a MONSTER to do his bidding. The accompanying TOME will provide you with clues to his motives. Good Luck."

card.name: Out Of My Mind
card.text: Arriving in a simple brown wrapper, the antique book read PNAKOTIC MANUSCRIPTS across the plain cover. For hours I read, about strange creatures called YITHIANs who possessed singular mental powers (YITHIAN MENTAL CONTACT and YITHIAN PSYCHIC POSSESSION). Apparently, they can travel through time at will, stepping from here (WAKING WORLD LOCATION) into the future (NEW AEON LOCATION) as easily as we step from room to room. They could be with us now!

card.name: Outbreak
card.text: The carrier contracted the disease in Kingsport (KINGSPORT LOCATION) – he lived just a block from the DAWN BIOZYME RESEARCH LAB. He spread it to the others aboard the plane (TRAVEL BY AIR) and the DOCTOR was quickly overwhelmed despite his EMERGENCY MEDICAL EQUIPMENT. Authorities allowed an emergency landing at the COUNTRY LOCATION, after first establishing a GOVERMENT QUARANTINE about the airport. Evidence collected by the HAZ-MAT TEAM confirmed everyone's' worst fear: the dread EBOLA VIRUS was spreading!

card.name: Ozzy Orne
card.text: Can know one spell. Bury spell after it is cast.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist & Musician. Living Dead, Knows English.

card.name: Pallid Programmer
card.text: While in the New Æon this Investigator also Knows Binary.

card.name: Patricia Bridgitte Jodoin
card.text: While this card is in play, you may use a Gate to play Men In Black as Allies.

attr.value: Corrupt Dreamer & Occultist. Knows French & Glyphs

card.name: Pentagon
card.text: Use this Gate and lose 1 Sanity point to play any one Weapon Artifact from any Dimension.

card.name: Plan 9
card.text: Here you are a world-famous actor, and all your agent can get you is a B-MOVIE SCRIPT. You've seen this plot before in a dime-store TOME: the SCIENTIST or PROFESSOR invents a goofy-looking TIME MACHINE, which spews forth a shaggy MONSTER. The monster runs rampant, using its hypnotic abilities to ENTHRALL VICTIMS across the world (THREE LOCATIONS in different subregions). Only Our Hero and his sidekick, TOODEE-6, can save humankind.

card.name: Plastic Explosive
card.text: Add 4 points to Ally's Value. If Ally is Discarded or Buried this card suffers the same fate. ◆ Discard Plastic Explosive after use in Combat and Bury the Ally.

card.name: Police Investigation
card.text: Bury all Weapons of target opponent that have a card value of 2 or more. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Poltergeist
card.text: You may only play this card if your Current Location features the Inside attribute. Immediately play a Monster to your Threat. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Porta Portese
card.text: Spend 2 Sanity points to recover one Artifact from your Story Deck and bring it into play. Pay any Sanity costs for playing that Artifact.

card.name: Portophilia
card.text: An opponent may not play a Phobia on you while their current Location features the Gate attribute. Bury this card when you play a Sanitarium or Temple.

attr.value: Steadfast Professor & Dreamer. Knows English, Latin & Glyphs.

card.name: Promises, Promises
card.text: Calling yourself a Reverend, you use your power of MENTAL SUGGESTION over your gullible flock. They actually believe that the secret of eternal happiness can be found on a planet circling SIRIUS! You hold rituals at the rented CARLYLE HOUSE MUSEUM, keep them isolated in the COUNTRY LOCATION, empty their BANK VAULT and take everything they own (TWO ARTIFACTS or TOMES). Now they will follow you anywhere, even unto death (EVENT that affects opponent's ally)

card.name: Prophecies of Nostradamus
card.text: You may play Events (except Travel Events) featuring the New Æon icon.

card.name: Radiation Suit
card.text: This card has constant effect. Your Investigator is immune to any damage described as being caused by Radiation.

card.name: Regalia of the Outer Gods
card.text: Play only at an Exotic Location. ◆ This card has constant effect. You are not affected by any Great Old Ones and Outer Gods in play.

card.name: Reverend Baxter Lully
card.text: Flip this card to give your Current Location the Church attribute. During each additional Turn that you remain in this Location and that Reverend Baxter Lully remains Flipped, you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist & Priest. Knows English & Latin.
Steadfast Author. Knows English, Binary & Glyphs

card.name: Sardonic Serpentman
card.text: You may use an Artifact Gate to play Serpent People as Allies. You are immune to the effects of Radiation. You do not lose Sanity points when Radiation is listed as the cause.

card.name: Second Psychiatric Hospital
card.text: Gain 5 Sanity points, but remain here for a Turn recovering from the treatment. ◆ For each additional Turn that you remain here, Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Serial Killer
card.text: Target Discards his or her top Mythos Deck card at the beginning of each Turn. Bury this card once the target plays a Travel Event or arrives at a Location in a different subregion.

card.name: Serpent People
card.text: When revealed, Bury all Threat Events in the opposing Directed Threat. They have no effect. ◆ Joins Serpent People.

card.name: Servants of the Silver Twilight
card.text: Joins with Servants of the Silver Twilight.

card.name: Shaggai Mental Possession
card.text: Replace chosen target Ally with the Ally closest to the bottom of opponent's Story Deck. If none, Spell may not be cast.

card.name: Shariil Sophast
card.text: Bury this card to remove the Gate attribute from your opponent's Current Location.

card.name: Shoggoth Lord
card.text: Use a Gate at a Location with a red Sanity pentagram to play Shoggoth Lord as an Ally. ◆ Add 2 points to value of Shoggoth in your Directed Threat if that Directed Threat contains Shoggoth Lord, or if Shoggoth Lord is your Ally.

card.name: Shub-Niggurath
card.text: All Monsters may be played as Allies (still must use a Gate). ◆ Increase the value of all Dark Young by one point. ◆ No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Shuttle Icarus
card.text: You may play this card only at a Space or Outside Location. On a following Turn play a new Space or Outside Location in any Region right-side-up.

card.name: Sirius
card.text: Bury all Star Events in play. All Weapons with card values of 2 points or fewer are Enchanted.

card.name: Skeptical Pathologist
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard up to two cards and replace them with new cards drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Smithsonian Institution
card.text: Use this Gate and lose 1 Sanity point to play any one non-Weapon Artifact from any Dimension. ◆ Your Adventurer and Explorer Allies add 1 point to their card value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Smugglers Tunnels
card.text: You may use this Gate to play New Æon Monsters.

card.name: Song of the Stellar Larvae
card.text: You may play one Monster allowing Travel as a Special Effect to the top of your Story Deck. Then, immediately play a new Location, as allowed by the Monster's Special Effect, as your Current Location.

card.name: Space Suit
card.text: This card has constant effect. Your Investigator is able to survive in Space.

card.name: Star Vampire
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if you or your opponent is in a Space Location. ◆ Invisible when any Star is in play. ◆ Joins Star Vampire.

card.name: Stealth Fighter
card.text: Invisible. May join a Directed Threat during the Artifacts Use phase of Combat; treat as a Lesser Servitor Monster.

card.name: Tactical Nuclear Bomb
card.text: Discard this card to Bury all Monsters in all Threats except Great Old Ones and Outer Gods. Radiation cuases the player of this card to lose 3 additional Sanity points when it is used.

card.name: Tank
card.text: May be committed to Defend against one Directed Threat during the Artifacts Use phase of Combat; counts as an Ally. Bury Tank only it if takes its full value in Sanity loss.

card.name: Taser
card.text: Add 1 point to Ally's value. If the Ally bearing this Weapon is lost, this card suffers the same fate. ◆ Bury this card to stun a random Monster in a Directed Threat facing your Investigator. It returns to Opponent's Hand.

card.name: Television
card.text: Target Flips all Allies face-down. They remain so while this card is in play. Bury this card if target plays a Day Event, a Tome, or at the end of the Round.

card.name: Temple to Aesathog
card.text: This card fulfills the Space requirement for playing Azathoth. ◆ You may play Serpent People as Allies, Gate use not required.

card.name: Temporal Lash
card.text: When cast upon an opponent, you force him or her to Discard the Ally closest to the bottom of his or her Story Deck.

card.name: Terrorist Strike
card.text: Even if already Walking, your opponent must play a Travel Event or a new Location next Turn or suffer an attack worth 5 points. Allies may defend. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Thaasophobia
card.text: Opponent loses 1 Sanity point if he or she passes.

card.name: Time Flux
card.text: Using a Gate, play this card to immediately play one New Aeon Ally, Artifact, Monster, or Tome that you could otherwise play at your Current Location. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Time Machine
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity point to use. Flip this card and walk to any Location (except Exotic) in another Dimension. If your new Location is in the same subregion as your Current Location, you may instead play it right-side-up.

card.name: Today's Tabloid Headlines
card.text: Mysterious CROP CIRCLES Reveal Cancer Cure! Alien UFO Secretly Held at AREA 51! POLICE DETECTIVE Escapes Gruesome ALIEN ABDUCTION! Experimental ANTI-GRAVITY HARNESS Fails Secret Government Test. Alien Spacecraft Destroyed In Midair - TWO BUSINESSES Burned By Fallen Wreckage!

card.name: Toodee-6
card.text: Toodee-6 can see Invisible Monsters, can not be given Weapons, and is immune to Epidemics. Bury Toodee-6 during Combat only if it takes its full card value in Sanity loss.

card.name: Trigger-Happy Mercenary
card.text: While in the New Æon this Investigator has a Maximum of 8

card.name: Tsathoggua
card.text: At the end of Combat, prior to the regular Discard phase, all Investigators Discard Monster cards remaining in their Hands. ◆ No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Turquoise Skyhawk
card.text: Discard this card and gain 3 Sanity points, but reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. Apply any Sanity gain or loss indicated in the pentagram on the card, then Discard it.

card.name: Tycho Base
card.text: Your Investigator automatically survives in Space at this Location. ◆ For each Turn spent on Tycho Base doing nothing else, gain 1 Sanity point. ◆ You may walk to DBZ Spacelab.

card.name: U.S. Coastguard Station
card.text: Spend 2 Sanity points to recover one Artifact from your Story Deck and bring it into play. Pay any Sanity costs for playing that Artifact.

card.name: UFO
card.text: You must have Greys in play as an Ally to play this card. ◆ You may immediately play a new Location in any Region or Dimension (except non-space Exotic Locations) right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Unexpected Eclipse
card.text: This is an Eclipse card. It is now Day, Bury all Day or Night Events and you may also Bury any one other Event card in play, except Travel Events.

card.name: Vatican, The
card.text: Gain 5 Sanity points now but you must spend the next Turn in atonement (doing nothing else). ◆ During each additional Turn you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Werewolf
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card when any Night Event is in play; add 2 when Full Moon is in play. ◆ Joins Werewolf.

card.name: With Neighbors Like These...
card.text: You saw trouble coming when those folk moved into the HOUSE next door, from some odd COUNTRY LOCATION. The TELEVISION constantly blares, the eldest kid sawed through your fence with a CHAINSAW, and the young one built a homemade FRAGMENTATION GRENADE. The parents are nothing but T.V. ZOMBIES. You asked for a POLICE INVESTIGATION but when the husband found out he got his gun and began GOING POSTAL. Now, you learn that a GOVERNMENT agency is investigating you!

card.name: Wreck of the Hellene
card.text: While a Star Event is in play, you may walk between this Location and any other Location card in any Dimension, except Exotic locations.

card.name: Yithian Psychic Possession
card.text: Bury an Ally that was Just Played or who was in play and whose abilites or Special Effect were just used. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Yog Sothoth
card.text: Treat all Locations in all Dimensions as if they belong to the same Region. ◆ No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Yucca Mountain Project
card.text: You must be able to survive Radiation or lose 5 Sanity points at the beginning of each Turn. ◆ Each Monster played to your Threat at this Gate cost 1 Sanity point less than normal to play, to a minimum of zero.

card.name: Yuggoth
card.text: May play this card in any Dimension; assumes Dimension Indicator of previous Current Location. ◆ Beginning each Turn you must be able to survive in Space or lose 5 Sanity points. ◆ For each Turn spent on Yuggoth doing nothing else, may draw two cards from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Yuggoth Attacks!
card.text: Like a SWARM OF INSECTS your hunting party of at least TWO different MI-GO landed near the naked ape settlement (TOWN or VILLAGE). The apes and their FAITHFUL HOUNDS put up a SIRIUS fight at the CHURCH, but were no match for your blazing rayguns (ENCHANTED WEAPON). The ape you captured, whose mind is now trapped in your MI-GO BRAINCASE, faces his worst NIGHTMARE and will fetch a high price back on YUGGOTH!

card.name: Zanthu Tablets: A Conjectural Translation
card.text: Spells or Artifacts that affect the top card of your Story Deck can not be used against you.

card.name: Zombies
card.text: Value is 1 during the Day. If any Allies are lost in Combat involving Zombies, begin next Round with one Zombies card face-down in your Threat (forms a new Threat). ◆ Joins Living Dead.
